description: Launched in 2017, Billie is an award-winning shave and body care brand that was built to champion womankind. We’re committed to a working environment that welcomes, empowers and celebrates all of our team members' unique identities. Our flexible working model allows our team to work remotely, but we also have a beautiful New York City office that’s available to all team members, if and when they want a dedicated space.At Billie, we are constantly striving for growth and innovation. We’ve kicked off our search for a best-in-class brand media expert who has experience executing all aspects of brand media. As our Senior Manager of Brand Media, you’ll lead all aspects of paid media, with a focus on driving awareness and consideration for all Billie products. You’ll build high level data-driven strategies, negotiate contracts, execute and optimize plans for ultimate success. If you have a knack for strategic thinking, making data-informed decisions, and you thrive when collaborating with creative teams, this role is your perfect match!This position reports to our Senior Director of Growth and leads our affiliate and influencer marketing manager.What you’ll do:Lead development and execution of comprehensive brand media strategies to enhance brand visibility and awareness across multiple platformsEstablish ambitious brand awareness goals, track progress and optimize for successLead cross-functional collaboration to strategically develop and optimize the channel mix, aligning with business goalsOversee and manage the relationship with our shopper marketing agency, ensuring alignment with our strategies, budget, and intended impactCollaborate cross-functionally with creative and data teams to ensure cohesive brand messaging and campaign executionDevelop and implement robust brand measurement strategiesSeek ways to lead and innovate to maintain competitive advantageManage and develop our Growth Content Marketing ManagerWhat we’re looking for:5+ years of experience in media strategy and execution (DTC or SAAS experience preferred)A deep and proven understanding of consumer marketingComprehensive knowledge and experience in building a robust channel mixComfort developing and defending strategies with dataSkilled at building processes and systemsPassion for all things media and the Billie brandA strong communicator who can lead complex projects with cross-functional teamsA proactive and collaborative approach – you love working with people and people love working with youThe salary range for this position is $130,000 - $145,000. The actual base salary offered to a candidate may vary based upon factors including, but not limited to, relevant experience, time in role, base salary of internal peers, prior performance, business sector, and geographic location. In addition to base salary, the competitive compensation package may include, depending on the role, participation in an incentive program linked to performance.#LI-AC1Edgewell is an equal opportunity employer.
